summary: The story centers on a 14-year-old girl who keeps a diary about the ups and downs of being a teenager, including the things she learns about kissing.
cast: Georgia Groome|Aaron Taylor-Johnson|Karen Taylor|Alan Davies|Eleanor Tomlinson|Georgia Henshaw|Manjeeven Grewal|Kimberley Nixon|Sean Bourke|Tommy Bastow|Liam Hess|Eva Drew|Steve Jones|Imogen Bain|Ingrid Oliver|Emma Tierney|Natasha Tierney|Matt Brinkler|Heather Wright|Lizzie Roper|Jason Ramsay|James Flannigan|Benny|Charlie Wride|Matt Harris|Jimmy|Thomas Slaytor|Daniel Dove|Christopher McMullen|Ray Shirley|Augustina Amoa|Gurinder Chadha|Grace Meurisse Francis|Ghazaleh Golpira|Libby Hayter|Tom Howard|Charli Janeway|Tamara-Lee Notcutt|Chris Wilson|Ben Wood
title: Mi gato Angus, el primer morreo y el plasta de mi padre
